Type: exhibition
Decade: 1990s
Country: United States
Color: black, white, yellow

Open House at Art Center (1993)

Unknown

About

This is a Poster. It is dated 1993 and we acquired it in 1996. Its medium is offset lithograph on paper. It is a part of the Drawings, Prints, and Graphic Design department.

This poster combines elements at diverse angles to convey an informal buzz of human activity.

This object was catalogued by Julie Pastor. It is credited "Gift of Rebeca Mendez."

Dimensions

82.7 × 62.4 cm (32 9/16 × 24 9/16 in.)

Source

https://collection.cooperhewitt.org/objects/18653945/
